name: Long Way Down (PapaJohnsIDH)
description:
A simple 2D platformer with smoothish controls and Getting Over It style gameplay. Big shout out to Pixel Frog for the use of their assets. If you would like to support Pixel Frog please find them at pixelfrog-store.itch.io/  

Easy starting project that I hope you all enjoy!

New Update 3/4/2023:

World 2 Added!! Have fun and don't break your keyboard!
